main() {
  bool isOdd(int i) => i % 2 == 1;
  <int>[1, 4, 5, 7, 10, 14, 21]
  .filter(isOdd)
  .forEach(print);

main() {
  bool isOdd(i) => i % 2 == 1;
  [1, 4, 5, 7, 10, 14, 21]
  .filter(isOdd)
  .forEach(print);
}

main() {
  [1, 4, 5, 7, 10, 14, 21]
  .filter((i) => i % 2 == 1)
  .forEach((i) => print(i));
}
